description: A portable storage device holding the software necessary to inprint the entire genome of a living creature.

use_action.msg: You erase the data on the genome canvas.

description: Pieces of genetic coding from the genome of Coelophysis bauri implanted on a genome canvas.
The full genome of Coelophysis bauri implanted on a genome canvas.  The power to reverse extinction at your fingertips.
Pieces of genetic coding from the genome of Dilophosaurus wetherilli implanted on a genome canvas.
The full genome of Dilophosaurus wetherilli implanted on a genome canvas.  The power to reverse extinction at your fingertips.
Pieces of genetic coding from the genome of Tyrannosaurus rex implanted on a genome canvas.
The full genome of Tyrannosaurus rex implanted on a genome canvas.  The power to reverse extinction at your fingertips.
